title: Eastern TownHall Team Operation
description: Participating in Catalyst is difficult when you live in the eastern time zone and your language is not English.
solution: Eastern TownHall supports eastern countries with events, and translating content. The aim is to increase participants by 20% for each fund.
experience: Co-Founders of Catalyst Swarm, Eastern Townhall, Catalyst School. IT & Software Engineering. educators and accountant in East Asia & Japan.
